pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 14, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 14, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Providence, Rhode Island, United States of America.

Providence, Rhode Island, United States of America

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Kentucky, Matt Bevin.

Omni Providence Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Wisconsin, Scott Walker.

Omni Providence Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Rhode Island, Gina Raimondo.

Omni Providence Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Iowa, Kim Reynolds.

Omni Providence Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address at the National Governor’s Association (NGA) Special Session - Collaborating to Create Tomorrow’s Global Economy - and will participate in a Q & A with Governors.

Ballroom A, 5th Level
Rhode Island Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • For NGA media accreditation, please consult this link.

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Vice President of the United States, Mike Pence.

Rhode Island Convention Center

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Ballroom D, 5th Level
Rhode Island Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • For NGA media accreditation, please consult this link.

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Colorado, John Hickenlooper.

Omni Providence Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
